name: wechat2tg
readme_summary: The wechat2tg repository facilitates message transmission between WeChat and Telegram. It supports various WeChat protocols and enables users to receive and send messages across platforms, including text, images, videos, and files, with some limitations on specific message types like red packets and mini programs.
key_features: Receive messages from WeChat (personal chats, group chats, official accounts, enterprise WeChat)
Send messages via Telegram to specific WeChat users, groups, and official accounts
Support for various message types (text, stickers, images, videos, files, voice messages, etc.)
primary_use_case: Bridging communication between WeChat and Telegram for users who want to manage messages from both platforms in one place.
cover_image_prompt: A diligent messenger bird, wearing a tiny headset, perched atop a branch that connects two trees: one blossoming with WeChat logos, the other with Telegram icons. The bird is carefully transferring messages, represented as glowing orbs, from one tree to the other. Small UI elements showing chat windows are subtly woven into the tree bark. Digital particles flow around the bird, symbolizing data transfer. The repository name, 'wechat2tg,' is subtly etched into the branch. The scene is set in a sunlit forest clearing. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and rich details.

name: sbv
description: Web viewer for SMS Backup & Restore XML files
readme_summary: SMS Backup Viewer (SBV) is a web application for viewing SMS and MMS message backups from "SMS Backup & Restore" XML files. It allows users to import and browse their messages in a texting app-like interface, supporting features like multi-user access, media preview, and full-text search.
key_features: Import SMS Backup & Restore XML files
SMS, MMS, and call logs support
primary_use_case: Viewing and managing SMS, MMS, and call log backups from Android devices.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a librarian meticulously organizing countless scrolls of ancient text messages into neatly labeled digital archives. The librarian uses a magnifying glass to examine each scroll, revealing snippets of conversations and media attachments that appear as holographic projections. A large screen behind the librarian displays a user-friendly interface resembling a modern texting app. Subtle digital particles float around the scene, representing data being processed and indexed. The repository name, 'SBV,' is subtly etched onto the librarian's desk. The scene is set in a brightly lit, futuristic library. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with clean lines and vibrant colors.

name: chrome-devtools-mcp
readme_summary: The `chrome-devtools-mcp` repository provides a Model-Context-Protocol (MCP) server that allows coding agents (like Gemini or Copilot) to control and inspect a live Chrome browser. It leverages Chrome DevTools and Puppeteer to enable reliable automation, in-depth debugging, and performance analysis for AI coding assistants.
key_features: Get performance insights using Chrome DevTools to record traces and extract actionable performance insights.
Advanced browser debugging: Analyze network requests, take screenshots, and check the browser console.
Reliable automation: Uses puppeteer to automate actions in Chrome and automatically wait for action results.
primary_use_case: Enabling coding agents to control and inspect a Chrome browser for automation, debugging, and performance analysis.
cover_image_prompt: A detective meticulously examining a complex clockwork mechanism representing a web application. The detective uses a magnifying glass (Chrome DevTools) to inspect the gears (code) and levers (network requests), identifying and fixing any malfunctions. Small screens display real-time performance metrics and debugging information. The scene is set in a brightly lit workshop filled with tools and blueprints. Digital particles subtly highlight the flow of data within the mechanism. The repository name is subtly etched onto the detective's toolbox. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with clear details and vibrant colors.

name: zoxide
description: A smarter cd command. Supports all major shells.
readme_summary: Zoxide is a smarter `cd` command that remembers frequently used directories, allowing users to quickly "jump" to them using a few keystrokes. It is inspired by z and autojump and supports all major shells.
key_features: Smarter directory jumping based on frequency of use
Works like a regular cd command
primary_use_case: Faster and more efficient navigation of the file system in the command line.
cover_image_prompt: A seasoned explorer with a magical compass that glows brighter when pointed towards frequently visited locations. The explorer stands at a crossroads of paths, each leading to a different folder icon. The compass highlights the path to the most frequently accessed folder with a vibrant beam of light. Small UI elements float nearby, displaying folder names and access counts. The scene is set in a stylized digital landscape with warm, inviting lighting. The image should be in a flat design style with clear iconography and a limited color palette.

name: 3xui-shopbot
readme_summary: The 3xui-shopbot is a Python-based Telegram bot designed for automated sales of VLESS configurations, deeply integrated with the 3x-ui panel. It offers a comprehensive solution for managing VPN subscriptions, payments, and user access through a web panel built on Tabler.
key_features: Web panel for server, tariff, user, payment, log, and speedtest management
Payment gateway integrations (YooKassa, CryptoBot, Heleket, TON Connect)
Built-in support via external bot or user contact
primary_use_case: Automated sales and management of VLESS VPN configurations via Telegram.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a bustling marketplace where digital keys are exchanged for secure access. A friendly robot vendor, representing the 3xui-shopbot, stands behind a counter, handing out glowing keys to customers who pay with various digital currencies. Behind the robot, a large screen displays a simplified 3x-ui panel interface, showing server status and user subscriptions. Small UI elements float around the scene, subtly connecting the marketplace to software. The scene is set in a bright, inviting space with a modern, clean design. Use a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and clear details.
